column4: ok so i have full disk encryption  on the go and when i boot up the first time it is always good but once i install my graphics drivers the encryption key screen at boot is 640x480 or so instead of what it should be so its all smooshed, it works fine but what do i edit in grub to change it's resolution and is there a guitastic package for grubconfig (like kgrubeditor was)
no it smears all over the paper
translations is just for other languages
that cant survive in the competitive world of lipflapping
go into System>Preferences>Bluetooth and check make my computer visable
and then pick the right version
and make sure you have the right usb drive at the bottom
go into System>Preferences>Bluetooth and check make my computer visable
in System manu preferences submenu bluetooth in there
in there I can only see nvidia drivers ;)
